name: My Magical Friend
description:
A Witch Put Eight Items In A Magic Circle And Now I'm A Skeleton Who Needs To Summon A Friend!

Also know as: My Magical Friend ...is a small puzzle game with crafting elements. You play as a skeleton who has been summoned by a witch, and your goal is to summon a skeleton of your own. Use your bendy skeleton arm to manipulate objects and use magic circles - see if you can decipher the riddles of the ancient texts and summon a friend!

This game was made in 3 days for the Winnipeg Winter Jam 2017. 

Team:

  • Graeme Borland (@graebor) - Code
  • Amy Gerardy (@amymja) - Art
  • Julian Beutel (@julianbeutel) - Sound
  • Daniel Voth (@hyperscope) - Special guest voice actor
